name: Regulatory Communication
membership:
European League of Economists: www.elec-lece.eu
Glocomnet: www.glocomnet.com
goal: Education about and mediation of relationships within the financial sector, i.e. between financial supervisors, financial institutions and government officials, notably concerning the interpretation, application and revision of European legislation and legislative processes.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives:
Initiatives regarding Europe's financial sector.
Capital Markets Union, banking rules (CRD/CRR), investment rules (MiFID, UCITS, AIFMD), sustainable finance action plan
